item.description:
Ok..  looks like we're a go on the meet up for Sunday, November 27th.  Enough of you want to come.

Just a reminder, if you're coming for the first time please be sure to bring proof of vaccines for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

Anyone wishing to schedule a grooming for after the meet up, please let me know ahead of time.  We're going to be busy that weekend and an appointment will be needed.

As always, any questions just let me know.  Looking forward to seeing all of you!

Agni
item.name: November Meet Up
